feed.title: sgom.es
feed.subtitle: I’m Sérgio, and I work at Web Developer Relations at Google, helping developers make the web a better place.

entry.title: Using Sass to automatically pick text colors
entry.summary: Theming is always a challenge, particularly when you’re working on a library, rather than a standalone website. One example of an interesting issue that you’ll come across very frequently is choosing a text color that ensures readability and accessibility.
